The Challenge Network
Dear Summer Staff member,
Did you love your summer job at The Challenge?
Are you passionate about continuing to help young people to make a real difference in society?
If so, you should be a mentor with The Challenge Society! . For more information on upcoming opportunities to get involved with The Challenge Society, please see the attached message.
Best wishes,
Amanda Mealand The Challenge Society Staffing Associate
